pages.text: The nether is full of lesser demonic creatures, including ones that can even be manipulated by mere mortals.

pages.title: Lesser Hellmouth
pages.text: A small rift to hell, allowing Pigmen and Magma Cubes to escape

pages.title: Hellmouth
pages.text: A larger portal to hell, allowing Blazes and Feuerwurms to ascend on the world

pages.title: Greater Hellmouth
pages.text: Opens the largest possible tear to the nether, bringing forth Hellhounds, Ghasts, and Wither Skeletons

pages.title: Conjure Wither
pages.text: Open a unique hellmouth, summoning a powerful Wither to blight this world
